title: 5 easy tips for making better soup
summary: There are hundreds of recipes for every type of soup imaginable, but at the end of the day, the most important thing in any soup is the ingredients. If you start with low quality ingredients, your soup will taste like it came out of a can. If your soup is too thin, the best way to fix it is to reduce it on the stovetop for 10-15 minutes. Add your aromatics at the beginning of the pot from the very beginning. Slurp while you’re making it, it’s essential to creating delicious soup.
